name: Hextones: Spacetime
description:
Connect the Hextones to control the unstable relativity of the Spacetime travel! A matchup puzzle game with sci-fi mood and time mechanics, and an even more challenging endeavor through space!

Hextones: Spacetime continues the addicting puzzle challenge from its predecessor. A matchup game based on classics genres like Domino, Ishido, Mahjong, and 3 matches. There are 25 unique Hextones formed by a combination of colors and symbols, and a total of 100 Hextones to be placed onto the grid.

  • 5 colors (Red, Green, Blue, Yellow, Purple)
  • 5 symbols (Time, Space, Distance, Eternity, Thought)
  • 6 possible connections at a time
  • 5 connections bonus with increasing tiers

Place the Hextone onto the grid by connecting one or more of its sides to one or more Hextones already placed on the grid.
As more connections in a move, more points, but don't forget to complete the current Tier to increase the connections bonus.

NEW: Now you can see the next three Hextones, and swap between them before placing. Beware, don't waste time.
NEW: Hextones are unstable during this journey, if don't play any Hextones during the available time, it vanishes to return back later.
NEW Freeze Time mechanic: Complete a tier or a six-sided connection to earn a Freeze Time usage, and then slow down the Spacetime to have more time to think you move.
